original_title: Officers to coordinate LG bodies & Governors
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Janaka Wakkubura, the State Minister of Provincial Councils and Local Government on Wednesday (14) said that instructions were given to appoint an officer to coordinate between the Provincial Governors and the Local Government Institutions.
He said that the directive was given during a meeting with the Provincial Governors.
He added that the provincial governors are empowered to take such action to offer a more efficient service to the public.
